dji.sdk.api.RemoteController

Class DJIRemoteControllerSlaveInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.RemoteController.DJIRemoteControllerSlaveInfo

  • public class DJIRemoteControllerSlaveInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Remote Controller Slave Info

    It will contain the basic information about the slave remote controller and the permission. Developer could provide a function of showing slave remote controllers permission and basic information.
    Version:
    : V2.4.0
    Author:
    : DJI Software
